content: I created https://github.com/gdcc/maven-parent as a universal parent POM we can use in a lot of places, given the amount of Java project we have...

Awesome. This related issue has the 6.4 milestone on it (looks like Jim added it):

Publish Parent POM to simplify keeping Exporters in Sync #10482
Do we actually want this in 6.4? If so, we need to hurry up as the sprint ends next Wednesday and we'd like to release at the end of it.
I will probably not have the time to finish this. Sorry.
No worries! Shall I simply remove the 6.4 milestone from that issue?
